name: phonebookbackend
description: The backend of a phonebook application created for part 3.1+ of the course on fullstackopen.com

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../phonebookbackend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: David Miller
